Label: Weight 1
Definition: Weight of the subject in kilograms at visit 1

Label: Weight 2
Definition: Weight of the subject in kilograms at visit 2

Label: Age
Definition: Age of the subject in years

Label: Sex,Gender
Definition: The biological sex of the subject

Label: Race
Definition: The categorical race of the subject

Label: Education level
Definition: The categorial education level of the subject

Label: Smoking Status
Definition: Whether or not the subject admitted to smoking

Label: Subject,Patient
Definition: A subject is encoded as a human with a subject role
